method.name: GetDevices
method.tp:docstring: Get the list of modems known to ModemManager.

arg.name: devices
arg.tp:docstring: List of object paths of modem devices known to the system.

signal.name: ModemAdded
signal.tp:docstring: A modem was added to the system.

arg.name: device
arg.tp:docstring: The object path of the newly added modem.

signal.name: ModemRemoved
signal.tp:docstring: A modem was removed from the system, and is no longer available.

arg.name: device
arg.tp:docstring: The object path of the modem that was just removed.

property.name: Modems
property.tp:docstring: Array of object paths of all modems known to ModemManager.
